org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer

Class SerialBuilder<T,S extends SerialBuilder<T,S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer.Builder<T,S>
      • org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer.SerialBuilder<T,S>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MBusConnection.MBusSerialBuilder, WMBusConnection.WMBusSerialBuilder

    public abstract class SerialBuilder<T,S extends SerialBuilder<T,S>>
extends Builder<T,S>
    Connection builder for serial connections.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected SerialBuilder(java.lang.String serialPortName)
      Constructor of the Serial Settings Builder, for connecting M-Bus devices over serial connections like RS232 and RS485.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialBuilder

        protected SerialBuilder(java.lang.String serialPortName)
        Constructor of the Serial Settings Builder, for connecting M-Bus devices over serial connections like RS232 and RS485. With default settings.
        Parameters:
        serialPortName - examples for serial port identifiers are on Linux "/dev/ttyS0" or "/dev/ttyUSB0" and on Windows "COM1"

      • setStopBits

        Parameters:

        public S setParity(org.openmuc.jrxtx.Parity parity)
        Sets the parity, default is NONE
        Parameters:

        the builder itself
